Package com.example.sids_checklist.checklistutils

Class Profile_DatabaseHandler

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
com.example.sids_checklist.checklistutils.Profile_DatabaseHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class Profile_DatabaseHandler extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
A handler for managing profile data in the database. Provides methods for inserting, retrieving, updating, and deleting profiles.

    • getIDByUsername

      public int getIDByUsername(String username)
      Retrieves the ID corresponding to the given username from the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username for which the ID is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The ID corresponding to the given username. Returns 0 if the username is not found.

    • getUsernameByID

      public String getUsernameByID(int id)
      Retrieves the username corresponding to the given ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID for which the username is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The username corresponding to the given ID. Returns an empty string if the ID is not found.
